text: Judvan Lucas de Almeida (born 2 August 1991) is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Brazilian club Taguatinga. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:People from Piauí Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sociedade Esportiva do Gama players Category:Dorados de Sinaloa footballers Category:Ceilândia Esporte Clube players Category:Brasília Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Atlética Anapolina players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico
title: Judvan Lucas de Almeida
